channel.title: Editing client
channel.description: i have a client that i almost finished editing the thing is i dont know how to change the ip adress. i want it so when i run my client and click login it says my ip. also i dont know how to change the name of the client i used like i edited everything with my client's name but on the top of the page it doesnt say my server name but it says a diffrernt server name

item.title: Editing client
item.dc:creator: @Care4you Care4you
item.description:
@Care4you wrote:

  1. Open up your client file.

  2. Open up client

  3. Search for this code setserver(

  4. Beside that will be the currend ip address, change that and save.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_astro wrote:

Go into EGUI.java and it should have “” “” “” Enter you ip in those.
